remarks: Two square matrices of the same dimension are equal if they have the same entries.  (Contributed by AV, 25-Sep-2019.)
statement:
eqmat.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
eqmat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
eqmat $p |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X = Y <-> A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i X j ) = ( i Y j ) ) ) $.
$d N i j $.
$d X i j $.
$d Y i j $.
